revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruby Path |image = [[File:Ruby Path.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Ruby Path. |tokens = 43,000 |location = North of Kindle Road. }} '''Ruby Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || colspan=2 rowspan=5|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop |- | [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machoke |- | [[File:Slugma.png|40px]] Slugma |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Magcargo.png|40px]] Magcargo || <center>3,703,000 || colspan=3 |<center>N/A |- |}
==Items== <!--T:6-->
<tabs> <!--T:7--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 3 || 33.83% || 33.18% || 30.27% |- | {{Bag2|Rawst}} || 3 || 33.83% || 33.18% || 30.27% |- | {{Pokemon|Geodude|mimic}} || N/A || 11.28% || 11.06% || 10.09% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 10.53% || 11.29% || 14.69% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 10.53% || 11.29% || 14.69% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 3 || 32.47% || 32.47% || 32.47% |- | {{Bag2|Rawst}} || 3 || 32.47% || 32.47% || 32.47% |- | {{Pokemon|Geodude|mimic}} || N/A || 10.82% || 10.82% || 10.82% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 12.12% || 12.12% || 12.12% |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 12.12% || 12.12% || 12.12% |} </tab> </tabs>
